pr_title: [mail] Correctly named STARTTLS and a few small improvements

timeline.message:
Correctly name STARTTLS and a few small improvements

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

correctly formatted thing type xml

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

timeline.bodyText:
I think "mail" sounds better than "mails".
Although "emails" would be even better. "mail" sounds like parcel delivery anyway.
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,22 +41,22 @@
 	</thing-type>
 	<thing-type id="imap" extensible="mailcount">
 		<label>IMAP Server</label>
-		<description>Used for receiving mail</description>
+		<description>Used for receiving mails</description>

replies.bodyText: Thanks - I've updated the texts accordingly.
replies.author: kaikreuzer

timeline.message:
addressed review comment
